name: Fedora
body:
![](http://www.gdhillon.com/wssuLogo.jpg)
### Welcome to Fedora Drupal Page.
The goal of this work is to investigate the possibilities for combining the benefits of these two technologies and for designing a framework of a content management system that supports both

Approach 
Combine the popular content management system Drupal with a Fedora Commons repository, using Islandora as a middleware
This approach would provide a Drupal-based front end enabling an intuitive interface, and rich functionalities for supporting individual users and communities and a Fedora-based backend that enables the use of Semantic Web technologies that would support efficient discoverability, search and sharing of digital resources


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out the documentation at http://help.github.com/pages or contact support@github.com and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
